question:
With reference to the World Ozone Day observation, consider the following statements about Indiaâ€™s measures to tackle ozone depletion:
  1. India Cooling Action Plan/ ICAP will work in synergy with Skill India Mission.
  2. The plan seeks to reduce cooling demand across the country.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Statement 1 is correct: The ICAP will work with Skill India Mission to train and certify 1 lakh technicians by 2022 to tackle the technical part of the plan. India is the first country to release such a document. It covers the plan of action for the next 20 years. Statement 2 is correct: The ICAP aims to reduce cooling demand by 20 to 25% by year 2037-38. The plan also aims to reduce cooling energy requirements and refrigerant requirements by the deadline. This is to be achieved through personnel training and enhanced support for R&D.
